si.title: අසනීප නිවාඩු නොගන්නා ගුරුවරුන් සඳහා වැටුප් වැඩිවීම
body_lines: ප්රවාහන හා මාධ්ය අමාත්ය බන්දුල ගුණවර්ධන මහතා පැවසුවේ සීනි නිවාඩු ව්යාපාරයේ යෙදෙන ගුරුවරුන්ගේ වැටුප් වැඩිවීම සඳහා කැබිනට් මණ්ඩලය විසින් අනුමත කර ඇති බවයි.

en.title: Salary increase for teachers who do not take sick leave
body_lines: Transport and Media Minister Bandula Gunawardena said that the Cabinet has approved the salary increase of teachers who do not engage in the Sugar Leave campaign.

Commenting on the media, he said, "Teachers in Grade 3 (I) of Grade 3 (I). 525 will be provided. Grade 2 (I) for teachers in Grade 2. 1,335 and Grade 1 for Rs.. ௧,௬௩௦. This salary will not be included in their pension. He said that all those who were hired during the Sugar Leave Campaign would be given the same increase.

summary_lines: The Cabinet approved a salary hike for teachers excluding those involved in the Sugar Leave campaign. Teachers in Grade 3(I) will receive Rs. 5,250, Grade 2(I) Rs. 13,350, and Grade 1 Rs. 63,000 annually. These increases won't affect their pensions. The raise applies universally to all hires from the Sugar Leave period.
